author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Sam Hamilton "Add the shipping costs of a product from a supplier per product" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4269
This patch allows the saving of a shipping price the supplier charges to get the item to you on a per product basis.
